ValidationRule.description: IWCN-766 Disallow the user from selecting the --None-- value of the Claim Sub Stage. This validation rule only applies to Commercial and Residential Claims.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Commercial_Claim', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Residential_Claim' ), ISPICKVAL(Claim_Stage__c, "In Kankakee"), ISPICKVAL(Claim_Sub_Stage__c, ""), NOT ($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: None is an invalid selection for Case Sub Stage.
